item.title: Momma add a quote by Richard Evans
item.description: "It is often in the darkest skies that we see the brightest stars." -- Richard Evans

item.title: Momma add a quote by Susanna Wesley
item.description: "How would you judge the lawfulness or unlawfulness of "pleasure?" Use this rule: Whatever weakens your reason, impairs the tenderness of your conscience, obscures your sight of God, takes from you your thirst for spiritual things or increases the authority of your body over your mind, then that thing to you is evil. By this test you may detect evil no matter how subtly or how plausibly temptation may be presented to you." -- Susanna Wesley

item.title: Momma add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer
